basEventMib.name: basEventMib
basEventMib.contactinfo: Tech Support Broadband Access Systems, Inc. 201 Forest Street Marlborough, MA 01752 USA 508-485-8200 support@basystems.com
basEventMib.description: The MIB module defines the event MIB objects for Broadband Access Systems, Inc. interfaces extensions.

basTrapRecipientTable.name: basTrapRecipientTable
basTrapRecipientTable.description: A list of trap recipient entries. The number of entries is given by the value of trapRecipientNumber.

basTrapRecipientEntry.name: basTrapRecipientEntry
basTrapRecipientEntry.description: An entry containing management information applicable to a particular recipient.

basTrapRecipientIndex.name: basTrapRecipientIndex
basTrapRecipientIndex.description: This object indicates an entry into the Trap Recipient Table. If no entries are present, this object must be zero

basTrapRecipientRowStatus.name: basTrapRecipientRowStatus
basTrapRecipientRowStatus.description: This object is used to create and delete rows in the Trap Recipient's table

basTrapRecipientSnmpVersion.name: basTrapRecipientSnmpVersion
basTrapRecipientSnmpVersion.description: This object is used to select the SNMP version when sending traps.

basTrapNotificationTable.name: basTrapNotificationTable
basTrapNotificationTable.description: A list of trap notification entries. The number of entries is given by the value of TrapRecipientNumber.

basTrapNotificationEntry.name: basTrapNotificationEntry
basTrapNotificationEntry.description: An entry containing management information applicable to a particular Trap.

basTrapNotificationId.name: basTrapNotificationId
basTrapNotificationId.description: This object indicates an OID entry into the Trap Notification Table.

basTrapNotificationIndex.name: basTrapNotificationIndex
basTrapNotificationIndex.description: The Recipient's Trap Notification Index. The value specified by this object must be represented in the Trap Recipient's list

basTrapNotificationRowStatus.name: basTrapNotificationRowStatus
basTrapNotificationRowStatus.description: This object is used to create and delete rows in the Trap Notification table.
